name: notes
description: Standalone notes with automatic cross-referencing to contacts and projects. Hashtag tagging, pinning, and full-text search.
standalone_features: Auto-link contacts and projects mentioned in content
Pin important notes for quick access

features: Auto-detect contact names in note content
Show linked notes on contact entity pages
enhancements.description: Notes automatically detect and link to contacts mentioned in your text. Contact entity pages show related notes.

features: Auto-detect project names in note content
Show linked notes on project pages
enhancements.description: Notes automatically detect and link to projects mentioned in your text. Project pages show related notes.
